data.text:
@Bellehos If the bulk of the earnings are from domestic business? - except it to crater! - the USA is about to get crushed 🙁 possibly followed by outright starvation if heavy crude to make diesel can't be optained..

https://t.co/DbdtSVu28X
@Bellehos The cleanest way out for the index was always a reevaluation of the fed’s path leading to growth coming back a bit.  Not sure if I think that’s what will happen, but that’s the easiest way.
